about_the_game:
THE CURSE RETURNS ONCE AGAIN.

Mayuhara City, Tokyo.
The wounds of the mass suicide event of Mayuhara Academy from eight years ago have finally begun to heal.
The rumors of the “Mayuhara Curse” are still whispered amongst the students.

──The curse drove them to suicide──

A series of mysterious deaths have once again begun to haunt Mayuhara Academy.
Were these strange incidents really the fault of the curse?
Or perhaps…?

After the loss of their classmate, three young girls begin investigating the mysterious events.
As they peer into the shadow of the curse, they quickly find their everyday lives consumed by its madness.

About the gameplay

Noroware Cycle switches between side scroller exploration, investigation and visual novel-like scenes.
See what the people of Mayuhara city know of the rumors. Gather information with your smartphone,
search for clues and analyze your evidence to advance the story and discover the truth behind the curse of Mayuhara Academy.
